wikipedia_page.main: Dennis Wyndham (15 January 1887 – 19 August 1973) was a South African born stage and film actor. Long based in Britain, he appeared in 47 films between 1920 and 1956. He was born in Natal, South Africa.On 23 May 1917, he married the actress Elsie Mackay, who performed as Poppy Wyndham throughout most of her stage and film career. Her elopement caused her father James Mackay, 1st Earl of Inchcape to disinherit her. The marriage was annulled in 1922.
